alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL BERRIEN...CENTRAL LANIER AND NORTHEASTERN LOWNDES COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moody Air Force Base, or near Lakeland. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Valdosta, Moody Air Force Base, Naylor, Barretts, Hansell, and Stockton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
